definition: To provide information or report a situation, typically used when notifying authorities, organizations, or individuals about an event, incident, or occurrence. It involves conveying details or making an official announcement to ensure appropriate action or response is taken.

examples.german: Ich muss mich bei der Arbeit melden.
examples.english: I have to check in at work.

examples.german: Bitte melden Sie sich an der Rezeption.
examples.english: Please check in at the reception.
